datasetParam.name: sample_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of Sample IDs, or upload a file. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

sqlQuery.name: BeeDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dataset_name AS internal, dataset_name as term, dataset_name AS display from apidbTuning.MetadataSpec where dataset_name = 'otu_Bee_Microbiome_RSRC'

sqlQuery.name: SamplesWithMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.panCharacteristicMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$' union select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.panProtocolMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$' union select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.FallbackMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$'

sqlQuery.name: SamplesMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select pan_name as term, term as property, value from apidbTuning.panCharacteristicMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$' union select pan_name as term, term as property, value from apidbTuning.panProtocolMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$' union select pan_name as term, term_name as property, pan_name as value from apidbTuning.FallbackMetadata where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$'

sqlQuery.name: MetadataSpec
sqlQuery.sql: select property, spec_property, spec_value from apidbTuning.MetadataSpec where dataset_name = '$$metadata_datasets$$'
